Careers

Do you want to work in an international environment? Are you able to actively collaborate with people and organizations in your local environment and across the globe? Do you believe in sharing knowledge with your partners to achieve the highest outcome? Find out how a career with MBM International will satisfy your career.

MBMs is continuously looking for new talents. We are looking for staff, freelancers and interns in the following fields:

Consulting

  • Open Source consultants

Technology

  • web developers
  • web designers
  • Linux developers
  • network specialists

Marketing

  • marketing assistants
  • publication designers

International Services

  • interpreters and translators for the following languages English, French, German, Spanish, Chinese (Mandarin), Japanese
  • software translators from English to Vietnamese and Japanese
